items.title: Inception
items.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
items.awards: Top rated movie #14 | Won 4 Oscars, 158 wins & 220 nominations total
items.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page

items.title: Léon: The Professional
items.plot: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.
items.awards: Top rated movie #35 | Awards, 6 wins & 17 nominations
items.stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman
items.companies: Gaumont, Les Films du Dauphin, Columbia Pictures

items.title: Lost
items.plot: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.
items.awards: Won 10 Primetime Emmys, 113 wins & 397 nominations total
items.stars: Jorge Garcia, Josh Holloway, Naveen Andrews
items.companies: Bad Robot, Touchstone Television, ABC Signature
items.languages: English, Portuguese, Spanish, Arabic, French, Korean, German, Latin, Russian, Japanese

tvSeriesInfo.creators: J.J. Abrams, Jeffrey Lieber, Damon Lindelof

items.title: The Last of Us
items.plot: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.
items.stars: Pedro Pascal, Bella Ramsey, Gabriel Luna, Anna Torv

items.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
items.plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
items.stars: Ryan Coogler, Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Winston Duke

items.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
items.plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.
items.stars: James Cameron, Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

items.title: Plane
items.plot: A pilot finds himself caught in a war zone after he's forced to land his commercial aircraft during a terrible storm.
items.stars: Jean-François Richet, Gerard Butler, Mike Colter, Tony Goldwyn, Yoson An

items.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
items.stars: Dan Kwan, Daniel Scheinert, Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ke Huy Quan

items.title: Game of Thrones
items.plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
items.stars: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington, Lena Headey

items.title: Lockwood & Co
items.plot: A tiny startup, run by two teenage boys and a newly arrived, supremely psychically gifted girl, a renegade trio destined to unravel a mystery that will change the course of history.
items.stars: Ruby Stokes, Cameron Chapman, Ali Hadji-Heshmati, Jack Bandeira

items.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
items.plot: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne, along with Hank Pym and Janet Van Dyne, explore the Quantum Realm, where they interact with strange creatures and embark on an adventure that goes beyond the limits of what they thought was possible.
items.stars: Peyton Reed, Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, Jonathan Majors, Kathryn Newton

items.title: The Legend of Vox Machina
items.plot: After saving the realm from evil and destruction at the hands of the most terrifying power couple in Exandria, Vox Machina is faced with saving the world once again-this time, from a sinister group of dragons known as the Chroma Conclave.
items.stars: Laura Bailey, Taliesin Jaffe, Ashley Johnson, Matthew Mercer

items.title: The Mandalorian
items.plot: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
items.stars: Pedro Pascal, Carl Weathers, Giancarlo Esposito, Chris Bartlett

items.title: Pathaan
items.plot: An Indian spy takes on the leader of a group of mercenaries who have nefarious plans to target his homeland.
items.stars: Siddharth Anand, Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, John Abraham, Dimple Kapadia

items.title: House of the Dragon
items.plot: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.
items.stars: Rhys Ifans, Matt Smith, Fabien Frankel, Graham McTavish

items.title: National Treasure: Edge of History
items.plot: Jess Valenzuela, a 20-year-old Dreamer, sets off on an exploration to discover the mystery of her family history, and, with the help of her friends, seeks to recover historical lost treasure.
items.stars: Lisette Olivera, Zuri Reed, Antonio Cipriano, Jordan Rodrigues

items.title: The Flash
items.plot: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.
items.stars: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker, Carlos Valdes

items.title: Extraordinary
items.plot: Jen, a young, self-aware woman who lives in a world where everyone has a superpower except her.
items.stars: Máiréad Tyers, Sofia Oxenham, Bilal Hasna, Luke Rollason

items.title: Star Wars: The Bad Batch
items.plot: The 'Bad Batch' of elite and experimental clones make their way through an ever-changing galaxy in the immediate aftermath of the Clone Wars.
items.stars: Ming-Na Wen, Dee Bradley Baker, Michelle Ang, Noshir Dalal

items.title: Vikings
items.plot: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.
items.stars: Katheryn Winnick, Gustaf Skarsgård, Alexander Ludwig, Georgia Hirst

items.title: Andor
items.plot: Prequel series to Star Wars' 'Rogue One'. In an era filled with danger, deception and intrigue, Cassian will embark on the path that is destined to turn him into a Rebel hero.
items.stars: Diego Luna, Kyle Soller, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O'Reilly

items.title: Vikings: Valhalla
items.plot: Follow-up series to 'Vikings' set 100 years later and focusing on the adventures of Leif Erikson, Freydis, Harald Hardrada, and the Norman King William the Conqueror.
items.stars: Sam Corlett, Leo Suter, Frida Gustavsson, Jóhannes Haukur Jóhannesson

items.title: Attack on Titan
items.plot: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.
items.stars: Josh Grelle, Bryce Papenbrook, Yûki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa

items.title: Hogwarts Legacy
items.plot: Set during the late 1800s, a newly enrolled student at Hogwarts discovers that they possess the unusual ability to perceive and master Ancient Magic, becoming the key to an old secret that threatens to tear the wizarding world apart.
items.stars: Natalie Gray, Nathan Hendrickson, Alan Tew, Simon Pegg, Amelia Gething, Sebastian Croft, Nicholas Guy Smith

items.title: Star Trek: Picard
items.plot: Follow-up series to Star Trek: The Next Generation (1987) and Star Trek: Nemesis (2002) that centers on Jean-Luc Picard in the next chapter of his life.
items.stars: Patrick Stewart, Alison Pill, Michelle Hurd, Santiago Cabrera

items.title: Black Panther
items.plot: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.
items.stars: Ryan Coogler, Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira

items.title: The Last of Us
items.plot: In a hostile, post-pandemic world, Joel and Ellie, brought together by desperate circumstances, must rely on each other to survive a brutal journey across what remains of the United States.
items.stars: Neil Druckmann, Bruce Straley, Troy Baker, Ashley Johnson, Hana Hayes, Jeffrey Pierce

items.title: Avatar
items.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
items.stars: James Cameron, Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Michelle Rodriguez

items.title: Willow
items.plot: 20 years after vanquishing the wicked queen Bavmorda, the sorcerer Willow Ufgood leads a group of misfits on a dangerous rescue mission into the unknown.
items.stars: Ruby Cruz, Ellie Bamber, Tony Revolori, Erin Kellyman

items.title: The Wandering Earth II
items.plot: Humans built huge engines on the surface of the earth to find a new home. But the road to the universe is perilous. In order to save earth, young people once again have to step forward to start a race against time for life and death.
items.stars: Frant Gwo, Andy Lau, Zina Blahusova, Jing Wu, Clara Lee

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
items.plot: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.
items.stars: Morfydd Clark, Ismael Cruz Cordova, Charlie Vickers, Markella Kavenagh

items.title: Black Adam
items.plot: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.
items.stars: Jaume Collet-Serra, Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan, Noah Centineo

items.title: The Recruit
items.plot: Follows a lawyer at the CIA who gets entangled in dangerous international power politics when a former asset threatens to expose the nature of her long-term relationship with the agency.
items.stars: Noah Centineo, Fivel Stewart, Laura Haddock, Aarti Mann

items.title: The Witcher
items.plot: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
items.stars: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra, Mimi Ndiweni

items.title: One Piece
items.plot: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".
items.stars: Mayumi Tanaka, Laurent Vernin, Tony Beck, Akemi Okamura

items.title: Jurassic World: Dominion
items.plot: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, Biosyn operatives attempt to track down Maisie Lockwood, while Dr Ellie Sattler investigates a genetically engineered swarm of giant insects.
items.stars: Colin Trevorrow, Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Laura Dern, Sam Neill

items.title: The Hunger Games
items.plot: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.
items.stars: Gary Ross, Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Stanley Tucci

items.title: The Northman
items.plot: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.
items.stars: Robert Eggers, Alexander Skarsgård, Nicole Kidman, Claes Bang, Ethan Hawke

items.title: Dune
items.plot: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.
items.stars: Denis Villeneuve, Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Zendaya, Oscar Isaac

items.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
items.plot: Set almost 100 years after Captain Kirk's 5-year mission, a new generation of Starfleet officers sets off in the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on its own mission to go where no one has gone before.
items.stars: Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes, LeVar Burton

items.title: S.W.A.T.
items.plot: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.
items.stars: Shemar Moore, Alex Russell, Kenny Johnson, Jay Harrington

items.title: RRR
items.plot: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.
items.stars: S.S. Rajamouli, N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Ram Charan Teja, Ajay Devgn, Alia Bhatt

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
items.stars: Peter Jackson, Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean

items.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
items.plot: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
items.stars: Taika Waititi, Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Christian Bale, Tessa Thompson

items.title: Vinland Saga
items.plot: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.
items.stars: Yûto Uemura, Naoya Uchida, Mike Haimoto, Zach Aguilar

items.title: Inception
items.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
items.stars: Christopher Nolan, Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe

items.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
items.plot: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.
items.stars: Natsuki Hanae, Zach Aguilar, Abby Trott, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

items.title: My Hero Academia
items.plot: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.
items.stars: Daiki Yamashita, Justin Briner, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ayane Sakura

items.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
items.plot: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
items.stars: Jon Watts, Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon

items.title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
Gladiator
items.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
items.stars: Ridley Scott, Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen, Oliver Reed
